description: Oyster Blade is derived from the bolar blade and is a versatile cut full of flavour.Cooking hint & tips:PREP: Remove steak from fridge and rest it to room temperature before cooking.SEASON & SEAR: Lightly oil and season well with salt & pepper. Sear in a hot pan to seal in the juices. Tip: If cooking over a BBQ grill, do not oil your steak to avoid burning.REST: Rest before serving for a more tender and juicy experience.Level of Doneness:Pan Fry/BBQ:Rare - 3 min on each side and rest for 3 minutesMedium - 4 min each side and rest for 4 minutes (recommended)Well done- 5 minutes on each side, rest for 5 minutes
name: Woolworths Beef Oyster Blade Steak 600G
